column2: cats meow, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: This vitamin was recommended by my GYN due to symptoms of premenopause. I don't think I could survive without taking it now. It also seems to give me energy for my workouts at the gym. A good supplement all the way around. I recently recommended it to my sister to try.

column2: 35-44 Female  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years (Patient)
column9: Optivite has helped to balance my mood/stress level/tolerance (or as I often call it, the demon within) throughout the month, and especially at the 2 week and 4 week period of a cycle.  I have used Optivite for 2 years and have my reasoning skills back!

column2: dbee, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years (Patient)
column9: I used to lose 5-8 days of my life each month because of horrible PMS - bloating, fatigue, depression, muscle pain, and sometimes vomiting from the pain of intense cramps. This vitamin almost completely alleviated my PMS symptoms and gave me my life back. I have been taking it for years and I can not imagine life without it.

column2: carol, 65-74 Female  on Treatment for 5 to less than 10 years (Patient)
column9: I used this with vitamin 6 ( 2 weeks prior to period) for PMS!  IT worked wonders in my life . my students, and family!

column2: Adrianeb, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for 5 to less than 10 years (Patient)
column9: Optivite has been a life saver to me. I have extreme PMS symptoms and a therapist suggested I use this. I am not the same without it!Helps me through my difficult times :)

column2: Miss Green Jeans, 35-44 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: Optivite has helped me feel balanced. I haven't experienced PMS / bloating / mood swings since takling this vitamin. I love it!

column2: 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years (Patient)
column9: My PMS symptoms improved tremendously when I began taking this vitamin.  I had extremely tender breasts and this medication has alleviated that.

column2: Dragonstiger, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years (Patient)
column9: Suggested to me by a therapist,I have taken 6 per day of this for years for PMS symptoms of anxiety and/or depression. It has made a great difference in my emotional well being.

column2: 45-54 Female  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years (Patient)
column9: Optivite PMT has helped me with perimenopausal symptoms. It takes the edge off. And, it made my hair grow!

column2: rfcafsh, 35-44 Female  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years
column9: This vitamin has been a life saver for me.  I experienced a great deal of severe abdominal pain during my periods until I started using Optivite.  When taken regularly, my pain is eliminated almost completely!!!
